Posts.EditableText:
Hi, I am inserting my next creation of interactive fiction. Actually, "Return of the Emperor" was created before "Dark Reign", but I only translated it now. It is a classic and rather stiff fantasy with light (very light) science fantasy type additions.


https://www.mediafire.com/file/8ndtfrt9ap02x7h/Return_of_the_Emperor_1.0.html/file

Hi, I am inserting my next creation of interactive fiction. Actually, "Return of the Emperor" was created before "Dark Reign", but I only translated it now. It is a classic and rather stiff fantasy with light (very light) science fantasy type additions.
